Translations.Text: Ta xin, mi mu
zhexie shi mingbai de jingdian de jie wen
Yinwei tamen bu xindao, ni huoxu qi de yao si
Ruguo wo yiyu, wo jiang cong tianshang jiang shi tamen yige jixiang, tamen jiu wei ta er fushou tie er
Mei feng you xin de jinian cong zhiren zhu jiang shi tamen, tamen dou beiqi ta
Tamen que yi fouren zhenli, tamen suo chaoxiao de shi de jieju, jiang jianglin tamen
Nandao tamen meiyou guancha da di ma? Wo shi ge zhong youliang de zhiwu zai da dishang fanyan
Ci zhong que you yige jixiang. Dan tamen daban shi bu xindao de
Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Dangri, ni de zhu zhaohuan mu sa (shuo):“Ni qu jiaohua na bu yi de minzhong
Ji falao de minzhong. Tamen zenme bu jingwei an la ni?”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo dique pa tamen fouren wo
yizhi wo fanmen kouchi, suoyi qiu ni paiqian ha lun (he wo yidao qu)
Tamen ceng jia zui yu wo, wo pa tamen shahai wo.”
Zhu shuo:“Jue bu ruci, ni lia daizhe wo de jixiang qu ba! Wo que shi yu nimen zai yiqi ting (nimen de bianlun) de
Ni lia dao falao nali shuo:‘Women que shi zhong shijie de zhu de shizhe
qing ni shifang yiselie de houyi, rang wo lia dai tamen qu.’”
Falao shuo:“Nandao women meiyou zai women de jiazhong ba ni zi you fuyang chengren, erqie ni zai women jiazhong douliuguo xuduo nian ma
Ni ceng ganle ni suo gan di na jian shi, ni shi wang'en de.”
Ta shuo:“Dangri, wo bu dongshi di ganle na jian shi
Wo jiu weiju nimen, er taobi nimen, suihou, wo de zhu ba zhihui shangci wo, bingqie paiqian wo wei shizhe
ni zebei wo wang'en, ni suowei de en shi ni ceng nuyi yiselie de houyi.”
Falao shuo:“Zhong shijie de zhu shi shenme?”
Ta shuo:“Ta shi tiandi wanwu de zhu, ruguo nimen shi quexin zhe.”
Falao dui ta zuoyou de ren shuo:“Nimen zenme bu qingting ne?”
Ta shuo:“(Ta shi) nimen de zhu, yeshi nimen zuxian de zhu.”
Falao shuo:“Fengming lai jiaohua nimen de zhe wei shizhe, que shi yige fengzi.”
Ta shuo:“(Ta shi) dongfang he xifang, yiji jie hu dongxi zhi jian de zhu, ruguo nimen neng liaojie.”
Falao shuo:“Ruguo ni she wo er jing shi bie de shenling, wo shibi shi ni bian cheng yige qiufan.”
Ta shuo:“Yaoshi wo zhaoshi ni yige mingzheng ne?”
Falao shuo:“Ruguo ni shi shuo shihua de, ni jiu zhaoshi yige mingzheng ba!”
Ta jiu reng xia ta de shouzhang, na tiao shouzhang huran bian cheng yitiao mang
ta ba ta de shou chou chulai, na zhi shou zai guanzhong de yanqian huran xiande bailiang liang de
Falao dui ta de zuoyou de guizumen shuo:“Zhe que shi yige gaoming de shushi
ta xiang ping ta de moshu, ba nimen zhu chu guojing, nimen you she me jianyi ne?”
Tamen shuo:“Qing ni kuanxian ta he ta di gege, bing pai zhengmu yuan dao ge chengshi qu
tamen hui ba suoyou gaoming de shushi dou zhao dao ni zheli lai.”
Shushimen zai zhiding de riqi, yi zhiding de shijian jihe qilai
Youren dui minzhong shuo:“Nimen jihe qilaile ma
Ruguo shushimen huosheng, women huoxu shuncong tamen.”
Shushimen lai dao de shihou, tamen dui falao shuo:“Ruguo women desheng, women bi shou baochou ma?”
Ta shuo:“Shi de, zai na shi, nimen bi meng chongxing.”
Mu sa dui tamen shuo:“Nimen keyi pao xia nimen suoyao pao de dongxi.”
Tamen jiu pao xiale tamen de sheng he zhang, tamen shuo:“Zhi falao de quanli fashi, women biran desheng.”
Mu sa jiu reng xia ta de shouzhang, na tiao shouzhang huran tun xia tamen suo huanhua de (dashe)
Shushimen jiu baidao xiaqu
Tamen shuo:“Women yi xinyang zhong shijie de zhu——
mu sa he ha lun de zhu.”

Falao shuo:“Wo hai meiyou yunxu nimen, nimen jiu xiangxin tamenle ma? Ta bi shi nimen de toumu, shi ta chuanshou nimen de moshu, nimen bujiu jiu zhidao, wo bi jiaohuzhe kan nimen de shou he jiao, wo bi jiang nimen quanti ding zai shizijia shang.”
Tamen shuo:“Na ye mei shenme, women jiang guiyu women de zhu
Women dique kewang women de zhu she you women de guoshi, yinwei women shi shouxian gui xin de.”
Wo ceng qishi mu sa (shuo):“Ni zai yejian shuailing wo de puren er luxing, nimen que shi bei zhuigan de.”
Falao paiqian zhaomu zhe dao ge chengshi qu
Ta shuo:“Zhexie ren que shi yi xiao cuo ren
Tamen queshi jinule wo
women que shi jinshen de tuanti.”
Wo jiu shi tamen likai xuduo yuanpu he yuanquan
caibao he gaogui de zhuzhai
(Shiqing) jiushi zheyang de. Wo shi yiselie de houyi jicheng ta
diren zai ri chu shi gan shangle tamen
Dang liang jun xiang wang de shihou, mu sa de tonghuomen shuo:“Women shi bi yao bei diren zhui shang.”
Ta shuo:“Jue bu hui de! Wo de zhu tong wo zai yiqi, ta jiang yindao wo.”
Wo qishi mu sa shuo:“Ni yingdang yong ni de shouzhang ji hai.” Hai jiu lie kai, mei yibufen, xiang yizuo dashan
Zai nali, wo rang naxie ren bijin (tamen)
Wo zhengjiu mu sa he ta de quanti
Ranhou, yan sile qiyu de ren
Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen daban bushi xindao zhe
Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Ni yingdang dui tamen xuandu yi bo la xin de gushi
Dangri, ta dui ta de fuqin he zongzu shuo:“Nimen chongbai shenme?”
Tamen shuo:“Women chongbai ouxiang, women yizhi shi qiancheng de.”
Ta shuo:“Nimen qidao de shihou, tamen neng tingjian ma
Tamen neng jiang fu yu nimen, huo jiang huo yu nimen ma?”
Tamen shuo:“Buran, women ceng faxian women de zuxian shi nayang zuo de.”
Ta shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen suo chongbai de shi shenme
Nimen zui gu de zuxian suo chongbai de shi shenme
Tamen que shi wo de choudi, wei zhong shijie de zhu ze buran
Ta shi chuangzao wo de, ranhou yindao wo
Ta shi gong wo shi, gong wo yin de
Wo haibing shi, shi ta shi wo quanyu de
Ta jiang shi wo si, ranhou shi wo fuhuo
Wo xiwang ta zai baoying ri she you wo de guoshi
Zhu a! Qiu ni ci wo zhihui, qiu ni shi wo jinru shanren de hanglie
Qiu ni wei wo zai hou ren zhong liu yige ling ming
Qiu ni shi wo wei ji leyuan de jicheng zhe
Qiu ni she you wo de fuqin, ta que shi mi wu de
Qiu ni buyao lingru wo, zai tamen bei fuhuo zhi ri
ji caichan he zisun dou wu biyi zhi ri
Wei daizhe yi ke chunjie de xin lai jian an la zhe,(de qi biyi)
Leyuan jiang bei dai dao jingwei zhe de fujin
Huo yu jiang bei chenlie zai xie'e zhe de mianqian
Jiangyao xiang tamen shuo:“Nimen yiqian she an la er chongbai de, rujin zai nali ne
Tamen neng zhu nimen ne? Haishi tamen neng zizhu ne?”
Jiang bei touru huo yu zhong de, shi tamen he mi wu zhe
yiji yi bo lie si de yixie budui
Tamen zai huo yu zhong zhengbianzhe shuo
“Zhi an la fashi, yiqian, women queshi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong
Dangri, women shi nimen yu zhong shijie de zhu tong shou chongbai
Weiyou fanzui zhe shi women mi wu
Suoyi women jue meiyou shuo qing zhe
ye meiyou zhongshi de pengyou
Dan yuan women jiang fanhui chenshi, women jiangyao bian cheng xindao zhe.”
Ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban bushi xindao de
Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Nu ha de zongzu ceng fouren shizhe
Dangshi, tamen de dixiong nu ha dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei an la ni
Wo duiyu nimen que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe
Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo
Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi you zhong shijie de zhu fudan
Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo.”
Tamen shuo:“Yixie beijian de ren zhuisui ni, women zen neng xinyang ni ne?”
Ta shuo:“Wo bu zhidao tamen zuole shenme shi
Wo de zhu fuze qingsuan tamen, jiaruo nimen zhidao
Wo jue buneng quzhu xinshi
wo zhishi yige zhishuai de jinggao zhe.”
Tamen shuo:“Nu ha a! Ruguo ni bu tingzhi (xuanchuan), ni bi zao shi ji.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo de zongzu dique fouren wo
Qiu ni zai wo yu tamen zhi jian jinxing caipan, qiu ni zhengjiu wo he tong wo zai yiqi de xinshimen.”
Wo jiu zhengjiule ta, yiji zai manzai de chuan zhong yu ta gong ji de ren
Suihou wo ni shale qiyu de ren
Ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban buxin
Ni de zhu, que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
A de ren ceng fouren shizhe
Dangshi, tamen de dixiong hu de ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne
Wo duiyu nimen, que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe
Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo
Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi you zhong shijie de zhu fudan
Nimen zai gao dishang jianzhu yige jinian wu, yi gong youxi
Nimen sheli yixie baolei, haoxiang nimen jiang yong ju chenshi yiyang
Nimen chengzhi (tamen) de shihou, nimen shi hen canku de
Nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo
Nimen yingdang jingwei zhu, ta yi nimen suo zhidao de shangci nimen
ta shangci nimen shengchu he zisi
yuanpu he yuanquan
wo dique haipa nimen zaoshou zhongda ri de xingfa.”
Tamen shuo:“Wulun ni quangao yu fou, zhe duiyu women shi yiyang de
Zhe buguo shi laoshengchangtan bale
Women jue bu hui shou chengfa de.”
Tamen fouren ta, wo jiu huimiele tamen. Ci zhong dique you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban shi bu xindao de
Ni de zhu, que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Sai mo de ren ceng fouren shizhemen
Dangri, tamen de dixiong sa li ha ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne
Wo duiyu nimen que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe
Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo
Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou, wo de baochou, zhi you zhong shijie de zhu fudan
Nandao jing rang nimen anxin di zai zhe huanjing zhong me
Zhe li you yuanpu he yuanquan
you zhuangjia he juyou xianxi de rou suihua xu de ye zao shu
nimen jingqiao de zao shan zao wu
Nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo
Nimen buyao fucong guofen zhe de mingling
tamen zai difang shang shangfengbaisu, er bu yifengyisu.”
Tamen shuo:“Ni zhishi yige shou guhuo de ren
ni zhishi xiang women yiyang de fanren. Ni yingdang zhaoshi yige jixiang, ruguo ni shi chengshi de.”
Ta shuo:“Zhe shi yi zhi mu tuo, ta ying de yibufen yinliao, nimen ying de mou ding ri de yibufen yinliao
Nimen buke shanghai ta, fouze, jiang zaoshou zhongda ri de chengfa.”
Dan tamen zaile ta, suihou, tamen shen jue huihen
Dan tamen haishi shoule chengfa, ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban bu xindao
Ni de zhu, que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Lu te de zongzu, ceng fouren shizhe
Dangri, tamen de dixiong lu te ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne
Wo duiyu nimen que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe
Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo
Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi gui zhong shijie de zhu fudan
Nimen zenme yao yu zhongren zhong de nanxing jiaojie
er sheqi nimen de zhu wei nimen chuangzao de qizi ni? Qishi, nimen shi fanzui de minzhong.”
Tamen shuo:“Lu te a! Ruguo ni bu tingzhi, ni bi zao fangzhu.”
Ta shuo:“Wo dique tonghen nimen de xingwei
Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni zhengjiu wo he wo de jiashu, shi women tuoli tamen de xingwei.”
Wo jiu zhengjiule ta he ta de quanjia
Zhiyou yige lao fu ren chuwai, ta shuyu liu xia de ren
Ranhou, wo huimiele qiyu de ren
Wo jiangyu qu shang tamen, bei jinggao zhe suo zao de yu zai, zhen elie
Ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban bushi xindao de
Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Conglin de jumin, ceng fouren shizhe
Dangri, shu a bo ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne
Wo duiyu nimen que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe
Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo
Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi gui zhong shijie de zhu fudan
Nimen yingdang yong zu liang de sheng dou, buyao kekou
Nimen yingdang yi gongping de cheng cheng wu
Nimen buyao kekou taren suo ying de de caiwu. Nimen buyao zai difang shang weifeizuodai, bainong shifei
Nimen yingdang jingwei an la, ta chuangzao nimen he gulao de shidai.”
Tamen shuo:“Ni zhishi yige bei guhuo de ren
Ni zhishi yige xiang women yiyang de fanren. Women dique renwei ni shi yige shuohuang de
Ni shi tian yikuai kuai di luo zai women de tou shang ba, ruguo ni shi chengshi de.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu shi zui zhidao nimen de xingwei de.”
Tamen fouren ta. Tamen jiu zaoshou yinying zhi ri de xingfa. Na que shi zhongda ri de xingfa
Ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban shi bu xindao de
Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Zhe “gulanjing” que shi zhong shijie de zhu suo qishi de
Na zhongshi de jingshen ba ta jiang shi zai ni de xin shang
yibian ni jinggao zhongren
yi mingbai de alabo yu
Ta que shi gudai jingdian zhong bei ti daoguo de
Yiselie houyi zhong de xuezhe zhidao ta, zhe nandao huan bu keyi zuo tamen de yige jixiang ma
Jiaruo wo ba ta jiang shi gei yige fei alabo ren
er nage ren dui tamen xuandu ta, name, tamen jue bu hui xinyang ta
Wo zheyang shi fanzui de ren chang huai fouren de yinian
Tamen bu xinyang ta, zhidao tamen kanjian tongku de xingfa
Na zhong xingfa jiang zai tamen buzhi bu jue de shihou, huran jianglin tamen
Tamen jiang shuo:“Women jiang meng kuanxian ma?”
Nandao tamen yaoqiu wo de xingfa zaori shixian ma
Ni gaosu wo ba, ruguo wo rang tamen xiangshou ruogan nian
ranhou, tamen suo bei jinggao de xingfa jianglin tamen
name, tamen yiqian suo xiangshou de, duiyu tamen, jiujing you she me haochu ne
Wo bu huimie renhe chengshi, chufei na chengshi li yi youguo ruogan jinggao zhe
qu jiaohui qizhong de jumin; wo bushi bu yi de
Emomen meiyou daizhe ta jiangxia
Na duiyu tamen ji bushi shiyi de, ye bushi tamen suo neng de
Tamen que shi bei quzhu er bude yu wen de
Chu an la wai, ni buyao qidao bie de shenling, yimian ni zaoshou xingfa
Ni yingdang jinggao ni de qinqi
Ni duiyu gensui ni di naxie xinshi, yingdang jiayi ci'ai
Ruguo ni de qinqi weikang ni, ni yingdang shuo:“Wo duiyu nimen de xingwei que shi wugan de.”
Ni yingdang tuo kao wanneng de, zhi ci de zhu
Ni qili de shihou, ta kanjian ni
erqie kanjian ni lu zhong libai de zhongzhong dongzuo
Ta que shi quan cong de, que shi quanzhi de
Wo gaosu nimen, emomen fu zai shei de shenshang, hao ma
Emomen fu zai mei ge zaoyao de zuiren shenshang
Tamen ze er er ting, tamen daban shi shuohuang de
Shirenmen bei mi wu zhe suo gensui
Ni bu zhidao ma? Tamen zai ge shangu zhong fanghuang
Tamen zhi shang kongtan, bu chong shijian
Wei xindao er xingshan bing duo jinian an la, erqie zai qiya zhihou congshi ziwei de ren chuwai, bu yi zhe, jianglai jiu zhidao tamen huode shenme guisu
